version_description: General bugfixes and improvements

o Introduce your characters to the teacup ride, apple tree, and baseball
o Clearer coin gains when you have the coin doubler enabled
o Bug fixes and optimizations

New character and optimizations!
• Hatch and collect a new baby, the cutest one yet!
• We have updated the food and item shops to better explain how items unlock as you level up.
• Bug fixes and optimizations.

NEW basketball minigame! Time to show off your skills! 
Score as much as you can and see how many points - and coins - you can rack up before running out of shots.

Join Tama Club, an exciting new membership with exclusive benefits:
• Show off with the new VIP Tama Club House!
• Play as much as you want, with no limitations!
• Enjoy a completely ad-free experience!
• Earn coins much faster!
Check out our complete offer in the Shop! 

We have updated our Terms of Service and our data handling processes to fully comply with new EU GDPR data privacy regulations.
Fixed a bug where owners of the Welcome Pack lost access to the Coin Doubler bonus.

• New and improved economy! We hear your concerns and have re-balanced costs and earnings across the game. Your coins are much more valuable now:
o Lowered the costs of all Tamatown items
o Increased rewards from completing memorable moments in the photo album
o Balanced other economy values and fixed some errors
• Science themed Tamatown items! Enjoy your new rocket ship, laboratory, and yellow submarine.
• Minor bug fixes.

• 2 new characters! Teenagers Eriitchi and Haretchi are waiting to meet you! Check their biography pages for hints on how to evolve into them.
• Keep getting duplicate evolutions? We've added a small tutorial to help you get the characters you want (without completely exposing the mystery, of course!) 
• Careers now automatically update outfit requirements if you already own the outfit

Welcome to summer in Tamatown! We hope you enjoy our latest update!
o Level cap raised to 50
o 6 new summer themed items  and 6 new food items
o Higher cost food now fills your pet's hunger much quicker, especially food from watching videos
o Changed how you collect memorable moments and use the photo album:
- Now hiding information about undiscovered photos
- Hints now appear in Tamatown, your friends will think about items they want to play with
- Search Tamatown for photo camera buttons!

Check out our latest update!
o Meet Puchitchi and Mizutamatchi, two new adorable toddlers to discover
o We've been working hard to improve game loading times, stability, and battery life and are releasing these improvements today. We hope you enjoy a better game experience!

Check out our big 2.0 update!
• House Customization - decorate your house the way you like! Use the new paintbrush button in each room to get started.
• Meet Neliatchi - a beautiful new exclusive adult character to discover, inspired by the winner of our pre-registration contest!
• Level cap increased to 60.
• Various bug fixes - always receive coins from challenges, no more accidental night mode, subscription updates, and more.

Check out our latest update!
•New Minigame - play Doodle Pairs in the arcade, a fun and fast-paced take on classic hidden objects. How fast can you spot pairs of icons hidden amongst the rest?
•You can now tap on thought bubbles to navigate where your pet wants to go.
•General bug fixes and support for house decorating

Check out our latest update!
• New adult character! Meet Kikitchi, the world's cutest baboon!
• More house decorations! Enjoy additional sets in every room
• Fixed an issue where the app crashed if you launched it while offline

Check out our latest update!
• Spin for rewards - we've updated the free gift offer in your house with better rewards and a fun new interface. Open a gift today and meet a new friend!

HAPPY TAMAWEEN!
•Tamatown has transformed to a spooky autumn evening for a limited time!
•Play now to find ghosts, collect coins, buy Halloween decorations, and snap exclusive photos at night!
•Meet Ebatchi, our newest teenager tamagotchi!

Check out our latest update!
• Meet Mohitamatchi, our newest Toddler!
• Social connections! You can reach our Instagram and Twitter pages from new buttons added to the level map and release notes.
• Bedroom update - your tamagotchi can dream while they sleep.
• Fixed multiple visual issues in the kitchen
• Fixed Chamametchi bunny outfit

THE HOLIDAYS ARE HERE!
• Fixed TamaClub subscriptions issue where anyone subscribing or continuing their subscriptions after December 1st did not see the benefits in game.
• Countdown to Christmas! This month has many fun and limited time contents to explore!
• Visit our Christmas Tree in Tamatown and open free gifts all month long. You will earn exclusive items!
• It's snowing in Tamatown! Photograph wintery memorable moments before it melts away.
• Get festive! Decorate your house with all new furniture.
• Don’t miss the Mametchi's exclusive Santa hat in the shop!

Happy New Year!
• Buy new sets of furniture for your house based on the 3rd fan-favorite theme: Clouds and Rainbows
• Level increase: advance to level 75!
• Christmas is over but you can still find some winter decorations in the shops!

Introducing the Photobooth!
• Create and share amazing Tamagotchi photos with your friends!
• Decorate them with characters you evolve and stickers you collect throughout the game.
• Try the Photobooth today! Tap the new button in your house.

- All apartments have a new kitchen with additional wishes and a brand new food basket
- We´ve added the option to swap a Daily Goal with a different one and we added new Daily Goal types too.
- You can now continue your mini game 2 times after you lost.
- We´ve added 10 new levels to discover!
- Unlock 5 new decoration items for your kitchen

Check out our latest update:
• New selfie stickers for the Photobooth! Share photos with your Tamagotchi friends using stylized eyes, mouths, and more!
• Added achievements for using the Photobooth
• Fixed the birds spawning in Tamatown - they migrated away last month but are now back!

Join our Photobooth competition!
We are running an exciting Photobooth event during this release. Check out the details in-game!

What else is new:
• Meet Violetchi, our newest Adult character!
• New login events help you find activities you can do every day.
• Improved the kitchen table so you can always find an empty plate to fill.

Check out our latest update:
• Share your St. Patrick's Day memories using new themed stickers in the Photobooth!
• Daily challenges and Career objectives have been re-balanced to make them more fun to complete.
• Many small bug fixes.

• It's our 1st Anniversary! To celebrate, we're offering cake in the kitchen with a big XP boost. You have our heartfelt thanks for a wonderful first year!
• New Arcade game: 2048. Test your number skills in this popular puzzler
• Flower spinner in the living room has new rewards better in line with other daily gifts
• Small UI updates across the game - and more coming soon

Join us on Facebook! Follow our new @MyTamagotchiApp page for news and updates.

We've made many small tweaks and improvements in this update and hope you and your Tamagotchi pet enjoy them all!

HAPPY EASTER & SPRINGTIME!
• Spring has come to Tamatown!
• Play now to enjoy a spring-themed look in your memorable moments
• Get great deals on new themed town items, house decorations, and photobooth stickers!
• Meet PuchiTeletchi, our newest baby Tamagotchi!
• Made many small changes to game buttons and screen transition events
• Changed Subscription services to fix resubscribe and expiration issues

• Tamatown daily gifts can now be collected right outside your home by tapping on a new yellow mailbox when it's awake
• Collect FREE new daily rewards in the Shop! Visit the Diamonds building in Tamatown to see them
• Easter has ended, we hope you enjoyed the event! Spring themed items are now part of the normal level-up game economy
• Multiple visual updates to game user interfaces
• Improved 3D graphics across the game

• New leaderboards for Arcade minigames with more coin rewards! All local high-score progress has been reset so everyone can get these rewards
• Rebalanced pet needs timers based on player feedback:
- Showering and pooping now both contribute to urgency
- Play minigames without limit: no energy cost!
• Fixed yellow brick wallpaper in the kitchen
• Fixed Violetchi and Kikitchi voices and Violetchi's dirty textures

• A new toddler: Tamatchi is now available!
• Rebalancing of baby needs 
• Shortcut to  the Shop  on the Diamond Bar
• Fixed rotating Tamagotchis in the Tamatown
• Fixed miscellaneous bugs

The Outfit Shop not being accessible has been fixed !
Celebrate in Tamatown by launching a few fireworks !

- Introducing Daily Goals, a new way to help you progress in the game ! Complete them all for a bonus reward !
- Connect with your Facebook Friends and beat their high-scores !
- More bugs were fixed

- Halloween is upon us and all our friends have decorated Tamatown for this spooky event !
- Special Halloween Decoration to win for your living room are dropped in the Cauldron in exchange for candies.
- Get candies from Daily Goals, from Match-3 and from pumpkins hidden in town !

- All apartments have a new kitchen with additional wishes and a brand new food basket
- We´ve added the option to swap a Daily Goal with a different one and we added new Daily Goal types too.
- You can now continue your mini game 2 times after you lost.
- We´ve added 10 new levels to discover!
- Unlock 5 new decoration items for your kitchen

- Tamatown is ready for some snowy holidays!
- Take part in a new christmas event and collect unique rewards!

- Tamatown is ready for some snowy holidays!
- Take part in a new christmas event and collect unique rewards!

- New character added: Mimitchi (Adult)
including her new TamaTower apartment 

- TamaClub subscribers can re-roll wishes for free in TamaTower 
- TamaClub subscribers can re-roll Daily Goals for free
- The TamaTower floating icon in TamaTown and the balloon icon in TamaTower are clickable
- Improved friendship level up screen (explaining the benefits)
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Improvement on the food wishes of all Tamagotchis characters.
• New batch of brand new costumes for St. Patrick's day.
• Faster loading time with the latest performance improvements.

- New Event: Spring Festival. Collect Flowers to climb up the Reward Ladder
- 3 new mini games to play to collect Flowers
  > Witchcraft: reproduce the sequence of ingredients in the right order
  > Bridge Builder: estimate the correct bridge length to cross to the next platform
  > Scoop Tower: Catch the scoops to make the tallest tower, but avoid the veggies!
- New Spring House items and outfits for Murachakitchi to earn in the Spring Festival

Spring festival continues!
We added 2 brand new mini games to the arcade.
Can you beat the high score?

Spring festival continues!
We added 2 brand new mini games to the arcade.
Can you beat the high score?

A new Adult is coming and he's on fire!
Charatchi is the latest arrival in Tamatown, with his unique Tamatower Apartment, and as usual 3 careers to pursue!
There are also some strange sparkles spotted across town, in various locations... maybe worth investigating?

New levels to unlock, more rewards to collect!
Surprise Tamatown activities!
New costumes for your favorite Tamagotchi characters!

- Faster loading times 
- Lots of small improvements.

- A new Time Limited Event is live: Back to School !
- Play minigames to earn Books and progress in the reward ladder !
- Unlock school themed outfits and Academic Caps for your Teens and Toddler
- Those caps are for the Tamagotchi who will soon enter the Tama Academy, in the next update !
Game update! Check out the brand new Tama Academy in TamaTown. Unlock it at level 9!

Halloween is here, and it bewitched the new Tama Academy!

Tamatown has been decorated like every year, but you can also grab additional outfits and Hallway decoration to celebrate it fully!

Tama Academy improvements have arrived !

We have increased the fragments drop rate for the Hallway decorations that you were getting from the Cardpacks, during your semester. You should progress faster from now on.

Also, we have added a new Shop section where you can purchase Cardpacks with guaranteed fragments, in case you want to go even faster.

And during the Black Friday sales, you will even get a second Cardpack for free when buying any of the Cardpacks.

There is also a 50% discount on three different diamond packs !

New in this version:
- New Tamagotchi Teen: Obotchi is joining Tamatown !
- New Event: Celebrate Christmas and collect candies to unlock new outfits and a brand new Tamatown activity: the Bubble Machine !

Winter Event is starting !
- A new Adult is available, Smartotchi! Try to evolve into him!
- Smartotchi comes with 3 careers and his own apartment
- 2 outfits for Obotchi are unlockable through the Winter Event
- A new decoration set for the Living room is unlockable too!

Winter Event is starting !
- A new Adult is available, Smartotchi! Try to evolve into him!
- Smartotchi comes with 3 careers and his own apartment
- 2 outfits for Obotchi are unlockable through the Winter Event
- A new decoration set for the Living room is unlockable too!

A new baby is available! Ufufutchi wants to be friend with U!

Also, the Winter Event is continuing, with outfits for Ufufutchi, and a brand new Winter Kitchen to unlock!

A new baby is available! Ufufutchi wants to be friend with U!

Also, the Winter Event is continuing, with outfits for Ufufutchi, and a brand new Winter Kitchen to unlock!

Join the Easter Eggs Hunt!
Each egg contains a reward, so make sure to find them all!

And for our most advanced players, they can now level up to level 99!

The Spring Event is upon us!
5 new outfits are the prizes of this year's Spring Event.
Complete tasks to collect enough Rainbows to unlock them all!

General improvement on the game experience!
It is now possible to skip the level up animations.

- New Welcome Pack offer for new players
- Bug fixing

New offers adapted to the Tamagotchi character you have just evolved into.

Our team is also working hard on a big upcoming event for the next update!

Halloween Event is coming to Tama Town!

Complete Event's daily goals and participate in Mini-Games to stack enough candies to unlock all the treats!
General improvement on the game experience!

The Magical Holiday event is upon us:
- 4 outfits
- 1 Kitchen Set
- 1 Bathroom Set
General improvement on the game experience!
General improvement on the game experience!

The Winter Event is coming!
This is your shot to unlock all Winter decorations and outfits before it's gone.
Complete event daily goals and play mini-games to pile up enough Event points to reach the top of the ladder!
Various technical and graphical improvements about the Event system, for all events henceforth.
